DOC.brief_summary: To conduct follow evaluation Korean healthy male adult volunteer receive single multiple dos MP-424 tablet : - Pharmacokinetics MP-424 single multiple dos . - Safety tolerability single multiple dos MP-424 .
DOC.criteria: Korean healthy male volunteer age 20 55 year Subjects BMI < 18.5 > 25.0 , body weight < 50kg prior examination Subjects surgery know affect gastrointestinal absorption drug ( except appendectomy hernia surgery ) Subjects evidence cardiac disease prior examination previous history cardiac disease Subjects positive HBs antigen , serologic test syphilis , HCV antibody , HIV antibody prior examination Subjects experience symptom alcohol abuse excessive alcohol ingestion Subjects test positive urinalysis drug use ( amphetamine , benzodiazepine , barbiturate , cannabinoid , cocaine , opiates , methadone ) prior examination Subjects agree use physical contraceptive method study period Subjects agree use contraceptive method 90 day final administration study drug Subjects consume grapefruit , Seville orange , star fruit , cranberry , process food contain fruit within 7 day commencement study drug administration Subjects consume health food contain St John 's Wort within 2 week study drug administration
